text: Kupea is a genus of myco-heterotrophic plants in family Triuridaceae, native to tropical Africa. It contains the following species:Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families * Kupea jonii Cheek \- Ulanga District of Tanzania * Kupea martinetugei Cheek & S.A.Williams \- Cameroon ==References== Category:Pandanales genera Category:Flora of Africa Category:Parasitic plants Category:Triuridaceae Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Kupea
